title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.5 - Pleadings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.5 - Pleadings

State Regulations
(a) If a
penalty is specified in the notice of a violation, a respondent may plead
guilty by returning the notice of a violation and a check or money order in the
amount of the specified penalty by mail to the address set forth on the notice
of violation within 20 days of the date of service. (b) In the event a respondent pleads not
guilty, or fails to plead, or if no penalty is specified on the notice of a
violation, a hearing on the notice of violation will be scheduled. (c) A respondent may waive a
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
505.5

Amended

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
